name: NSTextCheckingTypes
desc: Defines the types of checking that are available. These values can be combined using the C-bitwise OR operator. The system supports its own internal types, and the user can extend those types by subclassing NSTextCheckingResult and adding their own custom types.

items.name: var NSTextCheckingAllSystemTypes: NSTextCheckingTypes
items.desc: Checking types supported by the system. The first 32 types are reserved.

items.name: var NSTextCheckingAllCustomTypes: NSTextCheckingTypes
items.desc: Checking types that can be used by clients.

items.name: var NSTextCheckingAllTypes: NSTextCheckingTypes
items.desc: All possible checking types, both system- and user-supported.
